column4: hey lets say i have some url like: http://myserver.com/some/path/to/repository/101/RPMS   how can i use WGET to download everything under 101... i want just this folder, keeping its structure...
if it's YOUR server, you can just rsync all the stuff
i cant access it with rsync... gota access as a url
you could use lftp http://myserver.com/some/path/to/repository/101 and then mirror, see help inside lftp
